content: Are custom feeds broken? I got a new phone (went to iOS from long time Android use) and was going to add my feed from changelog.com, but I’m seeing ‘failure’ when I click on the link to the feeds page
Everything looks normal. What is the exact URL you are trying to access when it fails?
(Feel free to DM if it's your private feed URL)

Thank you! https://changelog.com/~/feeds is the page I’m going to (the “Custom Feeds” link from the account page). Same if I go to “Feeds” from the account dropdown menu.

It is happening on iOS (Safari) and MacOS (Firefox). Using dev tools I see that I’m getting a 302 response. If it’s just me, it’s no big deal, now that there are fewer shows I listen to all of them anyways
Hmm the only reason that should 302 (it's working for me in Safari on macOS) is if you aren't signed in.

I previously had a custom feed with shows that are probably unavailable now (RIP JS Party), maybe that's it?

I took a recording, I'll DM it to you
Update - fixed by Jerod. Thanks for the help!
